column4: I got a question, I'm bout to be installing ubuntu, and I tether My blackberry to My computer to use as a modem but I have to use the software from verizon there access manager, to connect, but when I'm on there site it doesn't show one for linux os's so how would I connect ?
I don't think it will work.. there are no blackberry drivers for linux
bcharge is a utility to charge your blackberry from linux
